title: Mother critical after shot in the head by child
content:
COFFEE CO., GA (WALB) -
A mother is in critical condition after she was accidentally shot in the head by her four-year-old son.
It happened around 7:30 p.m. Sunday.
The Georgia Bureau of Investigation did not release the name of the woman, who was flown to a hospital.
The GBI said the mother and son were in the car parked in front of their home on Cutter Road near Douglas.
According to a report, the child found the gun in the car and thought it was a toy.
That's when he picked it up and pulled the trigger.
